author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
```
PS c:\> class BarFoozzzzzzzzzzzz {}
PS c:\> [BarFoo<tab>]
```

Expected behavior:
Type name should be auto-completely to be [BarFoozzzzzzzzzzzz]

Actual behavior:
Tab completion doesn't work

```
Name                           Value                                                                                    
----                           -----                                                                                    
PSVersion                      6.0.0-alpha                                                                              
PSEdition                      Core                                                                                     
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}                                                                  
BuildVersion                   3.0.0.0                                                                                  
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-alpha.16                                                                          
CLRVersion                                                                                                              
WSManStackVersion              3.0                                                                                      
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3                                                                                      
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1       
```

TFS:7615426

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body:
:tada:This issue was addressed in #15337, which has now been successfully released as `v7.2.0-preview.6`.:tada:

Handy links:
* [Release Notes](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases/tag/v7.2.0-preview.6)

title: Class tab-complete doesn't work
